word_group.brief_definition: 听力丧失；听觉丧失；听力损失
公共听证会；公证会；听证会

bilingual.target: 他的听力像蝙蝠一样好。

bilingual.source: But he began to lose his hearing.
But he could have trouble hearing you or speaking to you.
bilingual.target: 但他可能听不见你或无法和你说话。

bilingual.source: Then came a day when Marcenia got tired of hearing him say, "I don't take girls in my camp."
bilingual.target: 后来有一天，马塞尼亚厌倦了听他说“我不收女孩进我的训练营”。

bilingual.source: Children can develop problems with behavior, learning, hearing, and slower growth.
bilingual.target: 儿童可能会出现行为、学习、听力和生长缓慢的问题。

bilingual.source: She has some trouble hearing in her left ear.
He laughed loudly after hearing the joke.
bilingual.target: 他听了那个笑话后呵呵大笑。

bilingual.source: She became horry after hearing the ghost story.
bilingual.target: 听完鬼故事后，她变得恐惧的。

bilingual.source: I love hearing my grandma's story from her childhood.
bilingual.target: 我喜欢听奶奶讲她小时候的故事。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, I did. Hearing unimpaired, good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，我付清了。很好，听力没问题。

yingyinNormal.en: Nick, that's not a favor, that's a subcommittee hearing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 尼克，这得开听证会。

yingyinNormal.en: I have concerns. What concerns? Just things I'm hearing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有疑虑。什么疑虑？我听到一些传言。

yingyinNormal.en: Alicia, you're friends with Cary. Are you hearing anything at all?
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾莉西亚，你和凯里是朋友，你听过什么消息吗?

yingyinNormal.en: And you guys have been dating since kindergarten. So I keep hearing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们从幼儿园就开始约会了。我一直都听人这么说。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you hearing all of this? I'm trying to, but someone won't stop talking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你都听到了吗？我在听，但你一直说个没完。

yingyinNormal.en: So, did you spend last night hearing about this silly parking space fight, too?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你昨晚是不是也得听他抱怨那场白痴的停车位大战？

yingyinNormal.en: What did you just think? Hearing the CVR just now? Let me tell you what I think.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你怎么想的？听完驾驶舱通话录音后？我跟你说下我的想法。

yingyinNormal.en: Back at the ribs joint, I could just walk back in the kitchen when I got tired of hearing him talk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 原来在餐馆，我听腻了就回厨房干活。

yingyinNormal.en: And do you know how hearing myself say the word angry over and over makes me feel?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道一遍又一遍听自己说“生气”这个词让我作何感想吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, you're the doctor, but I am constantly hearing this annoying sound. Me, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是医生我听你的，但确实，老有烦人的声音在我耳边响。没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you going to start again? I am tired of hearing you rant about the crazy closet world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你又要再来一次吗？我已经受够了听你唠叨疯狂的衣柜界的事了。

yingyinNormal.en: I've grown up hearing all about it from my father. I'm just not sure it's my first choice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我从小就一直听我父亲讲关于它的故事，我只是不确定它是不是我的首选。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you for having me. Could never get used to hearing myself in headphones. Is that really how I sound?
yingyinNormal.zh: 感谢贵节目给我这个机会。还是没办法习惯在耳机里听到自己的声音。我的声音听起来真是这样吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Really? You're asserting some kind of immunity, Ms. Cesca? Your Honor, we need to have a hearing on this question.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的吗? 你在声明某种豁免权吗，西斯卡女士？法官阁下，就此问题，我i们要求听讯。

yingyinNormal.en: Congratulations, Howard. Thanks. Listen, I have to get a security clearance, so you guys might be hearing from the FBI.
yingyinNormal.zh: 恭喜你，霍华德。谢了，听着，我必须得通过安全审核，所以联邦调查局的人可能会找你们问话。

yingyinNormal.en: I've been hearing that a lot. Ever since I won, people think I'm great. Well, just this once, you can count me as people, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最近我听了好多类似的话。自从我得奖，大家都夸我棒棒哒。好吧，仅此一次，你可以把我和大家混为一谈。

yingyinNormal.en: We have to tell him. Tell me what? Damn his Vulcan hearing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们得告诉他。告诉我什么？该死的瓦肯听力[星际迷航]。

yingyinNormal.en: How is it imaginary that I keep hearing an octave above Middle C?
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么可能是臆想，我老是听见一种高于中央C的八度音。

yingyinNormal.en: You would've done the same, and where are you hearing all of this?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果是你也会这么做的，你从哪儿听说这些的？

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 公共听证会；公证会；听证会

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Some species use their sense of <highlight>hearing</highlight> more than their eyes as a matter of adaptation to a particular lifestyle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些物种更多地利用听觉而不是视觉来适应特定的生活方式。

examination_example.sentence: They use their sense of <highlight>hearing</highlight> to capture their prey.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们用听觉来捕捉猎物。

examination_example.sentence: And many experiments have shown that musical training improves certain <highlight>hearing</highlight> capabilities, like filtering voices from background noise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多实验表明，音乐训练可以提高某些听觉能力，比如从背景噪音中过滤声音。

sense_info_list.en: an official meeting that is held to collect the facts about an event or problem

direction_info.description:

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers conclude that cats' hunting style may have developed based on their common-sense abilities to infer where prey is, using their <highlight>hearing</highlight>.

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 听力丧失；听觉丧失；听力损失

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Definitely Theatre aims to build a bridge between deaf and <highlight>hearing</highlight> worlds by performing to both groups as one audience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Definitely剧院的目标是在聋人和听力世界之间架起一座桥梁，将两个群体作为一个观众进行表演。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 听力；听觉；申述机会；听力范围；证词听取
vt. 听说；审理；（hear的过去式和过去分词）

word_family.mean: v. 听见；听到；听说；知道；聆听；听说过；不同意；注意听；不允许；重视

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 听力丧失；听觉丧失；听力损失

examination_example.sentence: Last year, I visited a special school for students with weak sight or <highlight>hearing</highlight> loss (丧失).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去年，我参观了一所为视力或听力受损的学生开设的特殊学校。

examination_example.sentence: For students with poor eyesight or <highlight>hearing</highlight>, a seat at the back of the classroom is not a good choice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于视力或听力不好的学生来说，教室后面的座位不是一个好的选择。

examination_example.sentence: Make sure your <highlight>hearing</highlight> aid, wheelchair or eyeglasses are next to your bed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 确保你的助听器，轮椅或眼镜在你的床边。
